```{r include=TRUE}
descriptive_vars <- vars$confounders
for(var_ in descriptive_vars ){
  cat(var_)
  cat('\n')
  res <- stats_fun_var(data_[, .SD, .SDcols = c(var_, treatment_name)], var_, treatment_name)
  for( res_name in names(res) ){
    print(res_name)
    print(res[[res_name]])
  }
  cat('\n\n')
}
```
